text:
Goals, in particular:
(a) SDG 2 - End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote
sustainable agriculture;
(b) SDG 6 - Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all;
(c) SDG 14 - Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for
sustainable development; and
(d) SDG 15 - Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems,
sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land
